koohiiStory1: Someone wishing from the bottom of their heart that the clock would stop. A mid-life crisis perhaps.
koohiiStory2: Remember in the Wizard of Oz when the tin man wished for a heart and the wizard gave him that dinky little clock instead?
words: sense, idea, thought, feeling, desire, concern, attention, care
idea, notion, conception, sense (e.g. of duty), resignation, preparedness, acceptance
